segments.text: Good morning , sir . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm Bill . I'm in Room 908 . Can you change the room for me ? It's too noisy . My wife was woken up several times by the noise the baggage elevator made . She said it was too much for her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm awfully sorry , sir . I do apologize . Room 908 is at the end of the corridor . It's possible that the noise is heard early in the morning when all is quiet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Anyhow , I'd like to change our room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem , sir . We'll manage it , but we don't have any spare room today . Could you wait till tomorrow ? The American People-to-people Education Delegation will be leaving tomorrow morning . There'll be some rooms for you to choose from .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . I hope we'll be able to enjoy our stay in a quiet suite tomorrow evening and have a sound sleep .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Be sure . I'll make a note of that . Everything will be taken care of . And if there is anything more you need , please let us know .
segments.speaker: S1
